results.title: Compared to other statically typed languages, is TypeScript considered inferior? - Quora
results.snippet: Answer (1 of 8): It depends which statically typed language you compare it to. Overall, I would say the type system in TypeScript is superior to most other popular programming languages, though perhaps not to all. results.title: TypeScript: JavaScript With Syntax For Types.
results.snippet: TypeScript extends JavaScript by adding types to the language. TypeScript speeds up your development experience by catching errors and providing fixes before you even run your code.
